name: Assassin: Special Edition
description:
You are the Assassin, a highly skilled, super athletic hit-man. Armed with a powerful arm-mounted gun. you have been given the job of infiltrating the vast subterranean base which the arch villain Midan has made his own.

The action takes place over four huge zones and features an incredible array of Midanâ€™s twisted minions - all intent on your immediate destruction!

Can you overcome seemingly impossible odds and make it to Midans secret lair and lock horns with the arch villain himself? With skill, cunning and guile, you just might pull it off...
